original_title: A Practical Open Source Air Purifier
original_content:
In the years since the start of the coronavirus pandemic, its fair to say weve all become a lot more aware of the air quality surrounding us. Many of us have added a CO2 monitor to our collection of tools, and quite a few will have an air filtration system too. There are plenty of devices on the market that fulfill this niche at varying qualities and prices, but shouldnt a decent filter be something to make for yourself? [Naomi Wu] thinks so, and shes put up the design for her Nukit open air purifier online under the GPLv3.
The principle of the unit is simple enough: its a box with an HVAC filter on the front and a set of computer fans on its side to draw air through. But its more than just a box, as there are three separate versions for wall-mount, hanging mount or a freestanding tower, and each one comes as a DXF file with all parts ready for laser cutting. Its about as straightforward a way to get your hands on a well-designed and high quality air purifier as could be imagined.
[Naomi] has been quiet for a while in her familiar role as YouTube maker and guide to the nooks and crannies of her native Shenzhen, so its very positive to see her still active and producing projects after being warned off social media by the authorities. If youd like to see another recent project of hers, look no further than her update to [Bunnie Huang]s Shenzhen guide.
title: ユーチューバーのNaomi Wuが提案するDIYエアフィルターのデザイン
body: 新型コロナウイルスパンデミックの始まり以来、私たちは周りの空気の質についてより意識するようになりました。[Naomi Wu]は自分で作成できる空気清浄機を設計し、そのデザインをオンラインで公開しました。壁掛け、吊り下げ、自立型の3つのバージョンが用意され、レーザーカット用のDXFファイルも提供されています。高品質な空気清浄機を手に入れるための簡単な方法です。
titles: ユーチューバーのNaomi Wuが提案するDIYエアフィルターのデザイン
GPLv3下で公開されたNaomi WuのNukitオープンエアピュリファイヤーの設計図
3つのバリエーションを選べる！手頃な価格で高品質なエアフィルターの自作方法
自宅に合わせて選べる壁掛け、吊り下げ、フリースタンディングのエアフィルターデザイン
Naomi Wuの新しいプロジェクト！シェンゼンガイドのアップデート
